parameters.name: BaselineNameKey
parameters.description: The name of the image baseline.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~DescribeGroupedContainerInstances~~) operation to query the IDs of container clusters.

parameters.name: Criteria
parameters.description: The search condition for the image baseline.

parameters.name: CriteriaType
parameters.description:
The type of the search condition. Valid values:

*   **BaselineNameAlias**: baseline name
*   **BaselineClassAlias**: baseline category

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Image
parameters.description: The name of the image to which the container belongs.

parameters.name: ImageDigest
parameters.description: The SHA-256 value of the image digest.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RepoInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoNamespace
parameters.description: The namespace to which the image repository belongs.

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description: The types of the assets that you want to scan.
